About

I use lightweight markup and static site generators to create easy-to-maintain software documentation. Tools I like: Markdown, reStructuredText, AsciiDoc, Jekyll, Sphinx, Hugo, Sass, JavaScript, Python, Lunr, Elasticsearch, Pandoc, and Git.
